    • forDate

      public static BasicHeaderProvider forDate()
      creates a RequestHeaderProvider which will dynamically add a Date Header to each request as ZonedDateTime
      Returns:
      a BasicHeaderProvider

    • forAutoContentLength

      public static BasicHeaderProvider forAutoContentLength()
      creates a BasicHeaderProvider which will dynamically calculate the "Content-Length" header for the request payload

      *Attention*: Some libraries like unirest do not allow you to set this Header by hand

      Returns:
      a BasicHeaderProvider which automatically calculates the content-length header

    • forAutoContentLength

      public static BasicHeaderProvider forAutoContentLength(boolean skipOnEmptyBody)
      creates a BasicHeaderProvider which will dynamically calculate the "Content-Length" header for the request payload

      *Attention*: Some libraries like unirest do not allow you to set this Header by hand

      Parameters:
      skipOnEmptyBody - controls if "Content-Length: 0" headers should be skipped
      Returns:
      a BasicHeaderProvider which automatically calculates the content-length header

    • forXRequestId

      public static BasicHeaderProvider forXRequestId()
      creates a BasicHeaderProvider which will dynamically add random UUID as a "x-request-id" to each request
      Returns:
      a BasicHeaderProvider

    • fromProvider

      public static BasicHeaderProvider fromProvider(Function<HttpBRequest,HttpHeader> headerProvider)
